description:
Create snippets of text for support responses, sales outreach, or even common emails and save them in TextExpander.


What's new in TextExpander 8.4.1
Date Picker Improvements & Other bug fixes:

- Date Picker now supports custom date formats.
  By popular demand, customize how dates display in your snippets with flexible formatting options, including localized dates for different regions.

- Better support for Google Docs in Mac.
  Additional macOS permissions are required for fully enabling this.

- Additional bug fixes and improvements.
